Reduction : small view to big view

Function and code are not elegant enough!
Not sure what to say? It doesn't matter, gather your ideas first!
Know what to say? Then use the outline to sort out your ideas.

One modification, many changes, mom no longer has to worry about the adjustment style of my slides!

- learning costs are not small

- User experience is not good enough！

ideas.value: Everyone who shakes his legs has a sewing machine in his heart.

HEADER_INFO.en: An online user interface to create awesome presentation efficiently
HEADER_INFO.zh: 一个快速和高效创建 PPT 的用户界面

NO_IDEA.zh: 快来写下第一个独一无二的想法吧～

TRY_DEBUG.zh: 可以打开控制台进行调试～

ONLY_CONTAINER.zh: 只能插入到布局节点到后面～

SAVE_FAIL.zh: 保存失败，请下载到本地

DIRRERENT.zh: Gossip 制作幻灯片的方法和常规软件方式有所区别，
DIRRERENT.en: The methods of Gossip to make slides is different from conventional software methods.

LEARN_TIME.en: It is recommended to spend 10 to 20 minutes of study.

NEW_WAY.zh: 从此打开制作幻灯片的新方式🚀
NEW_WAY.en: Open a new way of making presentation🚀

BEST.zh: 为保证最佳体验：请使用 Chrome、Firefox 或 Safari 浏览器！
BEST.en: To ensure the best experience: please use Chrome, Firefox or Safari browsers!
